title: godoc: public methods in private types
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
Sometimes you use a function to initialize and return a new type, having the type like
private.

In those cases, godoc doesn't shows the documentation of public methods for private
types.

Here[1] you have an example, where the type column is private, but it is used function
Column to get it.


[2]: https://github.com/kless/go2sql/blob/master/column.go#L23
